reporter_caption.center: PACHECO v. LIQUOR CONTROL COMMISSION, 178 Conn. 752 (1979)

caption.center: JOSE F. PACHECO ET AL. v. LIQUOR CONTROL COMMISSION

opinion.opinion_text: The plaintiffs' petition for certification for appeal from the judicial district of Hartford-New Britain at Hartford is granted by the court.
opinion.attorneys:
Ronald Scott, in support of the petition.
Robert F. Vacchelli, assistant attorney general, in opposition.
